posts.post_content:
$200 net to me.  Paypal f/f or add 3.2% with regular Paypal.  Shipping is free within the U.S.

The card below is solid yellow along the top, so I think it's safe to assume it is another Mordecai.  I'll take some higher res scans and put them up later tonight.
Price drop to $95 if anyone is interested.
